tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trade_reconciliations (
    trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    trade_quantity INT,
    trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    external_source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
 trade_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 trade_date DATE,
 trade_symbol VARCHAR(255),
 trade_qty INT,
 trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
 );

CREATE TABLE external_data (
 data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 data_date DATE,
 data_source VARCHAR(255),
 data_symbol VARCHAR(255),
 data_qty INT,
 data_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
 );

CREATE TABLE trades (
 trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trade_date DATE,
 trade_type VARCHAR(50),
 external_source_id INT,
 trade_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE reconciliations (
 reconciliation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trade_id INT,
 source_id INT,
 status VARCHAR(50),
 reconciliation_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE external_sources ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, source_name STRING, data_date DATE, data_value DECIMAL )
CREATE TABLE trade_reconciliations ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trade_id UUID, reconciliation_date DATE, status STRING )
CREATE TABLE trade_transactions ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, trade_id UUID, transaction_date DATE, transaction_amount DECIMAL )
CREATE TABLE trade_errors ( id UUID PRIMARY KEY, error_id UUID, error_description STRING, error_date DATE )
